attributes.review: Do I even need to say why this app has a 1 star review. It’s just terably made and is so difficult to use. If I dident know better I would think a 12 year old made it. Anyway BOO getting rid of it now not worth the doace it takes up on my phone 👎🏻✊🏾
attributes.title: Boo

attributes.review: I dowloaded this app 5 days ago and finally, it just got done downloading today. Right away I got in, the app was acting up ! It made my phone so slow like my phone it’s not this slow. This app don’t even deserve 1 star >:/
attributes.title: This app is annoying !!

attributes.review: I wish I could give 0 stars really slow have major flaws like it took 3 days to download and every time I clicked the app it kicked me out and wort ERROR on my screen as a fellow trump supported I am disgusted me and chad were looking forward to download this app
attributes.title: U NEED TO READ

attributes.review: Will never recommend this app ever. Trump is trying to take down an app that teens and adults use on a daily that actually make them happy and feel accepted. Unlike trump who just makes people hate him every time he opens his mouth
attributes.title: Trump is terrible

attributes.review: 🧚‍♀️✨⭐️This app is terrible😻✨🐀. It crashed my phone, gave it ten💎viruses, and my phone exploded for the racism and negativity from this app😁💕. This is what trump is: 🤡 🐀! It’s so bad, my dog died 💕🍑 when I showed him this! Do yourself a favor (and everyone else), and give this app a ONE STAR RATING AND A TERRIBLE REVIEW! ✨⭐️🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: Read this 💕 it’s worth it!

attributes.review: This app didn't work for some odd reason I was thinking there was a glitch where it was giving false information by accident but apparently this is the same for everyone else who got it
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Every time I try to open it it completely glitches out and almost breaks my phone. 0/10 for me. I thought this would be a great way to access news and election information but I was sadly mistaken.

I would first like to say that this app took sooooo long to download litterly ages and then not to mention the fact that it mess up my phone more then once this app was supposed to be good but turned out trash I hate it and honestly hate is a strong word
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: yes i’m trump supporter maga maga maga🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 but he really let me down😩 i still support him but this app is trash🤮🤮 first took 27 HOURS to DOWNLOAD🥴 what????????? once it completely downloaded it didn’t open!!!! i had to redownload ehich took 42 more hours!! it opened and i was so dissatisfied🥱 app is so bad don’t download but TRUMPET 2020🇺🇸 🎺🇺🇸🎺🇺🇸🎺🇺🇸🎺
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: trash trash trash trash trash trash TRASH. This app is horrible. I thought if Trump really wanted to convince people to vote for him, he’d at least make a good app. But everyone’s review was ABSOLUTELY CORRECT. DO NOT download this app, you’re only wasting your precious time. Come on guys, y’all can do so much better than that.
attributes.title: no❤️
